mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.* FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.p_id = p.p_id WHERE c.m_idx = #{m_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (m_idx, p_id, amount) values (#{m_idx}, #{p_id}, 1) on duplicate key update amount = amount + 1
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET def_add = CASE WHEN a_name = #{a_name} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE m_idx = #{m_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM address WHERE m_idx = #{m_idx} AND roadAddr = #{roadAddr} AND jibunAddr = #{jibunAddr} AND detail = #{detail}
